subtitle: A delicious stir-fried Chinese dish with the contrasting textures of succulent pieces of chicken and sweet crunchy cashew nuts. Originally this dish would have been made with peanuts.

method.text: In a small bowl, mix together the cornflour with <sup>1</sup>/<sub>3</sub>0 ml oil and 2 tbsp water. Add the chicken. Mix well. Set aside for 10 min.
Heat a wok or large frying pan until hot. Add the remaining oil. Stir fry the chicken for 3-4 min until cooked through and golden.
Add the carrot, cashew nuts, bamboo shoots and peas.  Stir fry for 1 min.
Mix the sauce ingredients together. Add to the pan. Cook until the sauce has thickened. Serve.

title: Chicken and cashew nuts
